TC01.Measure: Available PUCCH ACK NACK PRB in Uplink
TC01.SQL: DECLARE @DATETIME varchar(50)=DATETIME_VALUE , @MOID varchar(200)=UNIQUE_ID_VALUE select TOP 1 Main.kpiValue as kpiValue from ( select (SUM(PMPRBAVAILULPUCCHACKNACK)) AS kpiValue from DC_E_ERBS_EUTRANCELLFDD_RAW where MOID  =@MOID and DATE_ID = @DATETIME  UNION select (SUM(PMPRBAVAILULPUCCHACKNACK)) AS kpiValue from DC_E_ERBS_EUTRANCELLTDD_RAW where MOID  =@MOID and DATE_ID = @DATETIME )Main

TC02.SQL: DECLARE @DATETIME varchar(100)=DATETIME_VALUE, @MOID varchar(200)=UNIQUE_ID_VALUE select Main.kpiValue as kpiValue from (select (PMPDCPVOLDLDRB-PMPDCPVOLDLDRBLASTTTI)/(PMUETHPTIMEDL/1000) AS kpiValue from DC_E_ERBS_EUTRANCELLFDD_RAW Where MOID =@MOID and DATE_ID = @DATETIME UNION select (PMPDCPVOLDLDRB-PMPDCPVOLDLDRBLASTTTI)/(PMUETHPTIMEDL/1000) AS kpiValue from DC_E_ERBS_EUTRANCELLTDD_RAW Where MOID  =@MOID and DATE_ID = @DATETIME )Main

TC03.SQL: DECLARE @DATETIME varchar(50)=DATETIME_VALUE , @MOID varchar(200)=UNIQUE_ID_VALUE select CAST(ROUND(avg(KPI_Value), 2) AS NUMERIC(36,2)) AS kpiValue from (SELECT DATE_ID,((SUM(DC_E_BSS_CELL_CS_RAW.CLSDCCH_CTRALACC)/SUM(DC_E_BSS_CELL_CS_RAW.CLSDCCH_CNSCAN))) AS KPI_Value FROM DC_E_BSS_CELL_CS_RAW where DATE_ID = @DATETIME  AND  MOID=@MOID GROUP BY DATETIME_ID ORDER BY DATETIME_ID ASC) A

TC04.SQL: declare @time varchar(50) = DATETIME_VALUE declare @moid varchar(200) = UNIQUE_ID_VALUE select CAST(ROUND(avg(result), 2) AS NUMERIC(36,2)) AS kpiValue from(select ((((SUM(D1.PMNOOFMSURECEIVED)+SUM(D2.PMNOOFMSURECEIVED)+SUM(D3.PMNOOFMSURECEIVED)+SUM(D4.PMNOOFMSURECEIVED)+SUM(D5.PMNOOFMSURECEIVED)+SUM(D6.PMNOOFMSURECEIVED)+SUM(D1.PMNOOFMSUTRANSMITTED)+SUM(D4.PMNOOFMSUTRANSMITTED)+SUM(D5.PMNOOFMSUTRANSMITTED)+SUM(D2.PMNOOFMSUTRANSMITTED)+SUM(D3.PMNOOFMSUTRANSMITTED)+SUM(D6.PMNOOFMSUTRANSMITTED))-(SUM(D1.PMNOOFNACKS)+SUM(D2.PMNOOFNACKS)+SUM(D3.PMNOOFNACKS)+SUM(D4.PMNOOFNACKS)+SUM(D5.PMNOOFNACKS)+SUM(D6.PMNOOFNACKS)+SUM(D4.PMNOOFSURECEIVEDINERROR)+SUM(D5.PMNOOFSURECEIVEDINERROR)+SUM(D1.PMNOOFSURECEIVEDINERROR)+SUM(D2.PMNOOFSURECEIVEDINERROR)+SUM(D3.PMNOOFSURECEIVEDINERROR)+SUM(D6.PMNOOFSURECEIVEDINERROR)))/(SUM(D1.PMNOOFMSURECEIVED)+SUM(D2.PMNOOFMSURECEIVED)+SUM(D3.PMNOOFMSURECEIVED)+SUM(D4.PMNOOFMSURECEIVED)+SUM(D5.PMNOOFMSURECEIVED)+SUM(D6.PMNOOFMSURECEIVED)+SUM(D1.PMNOOFMSUTRANSMITTED)+SUM(D4.PMNOOFMSUTRANSMITTED)+SUM(D5.PMNOOFMSUTRANSMITTED)+SUM(D2.PMNOOFMSUTRANSMITTED)+SUM(D3.PMNOOFMSUTRANSMITTED)+SUM(D6.PMNOOFMSUTRANSMITTED)))*100) as Result from DC_E_MGW_MTP2TPANSI_DELTA D1 , DC_E_MGW_MTP2TPCHINA_DELTA D2 ,DC_E_MGW_MTP2TPITU_DELTA D3, DC_E_MGW_MTP2HSLTPCHINA_RAW D4 , DC_E_MGW_MTP2HSLTPITU_RAW D5 , DC_E_MGW_MTP2TPTTC_DELTA D6 where       D1.DATETIME_ID = D2.DATETIME_ID and D1.DATETIME_ID = D3.DATETIME_ID and D1.DATETIME_ID = D4.DATETIME_ID and D1.DATETIME_ID = D5.DATETIME_ID and D1.DATETIME_ID = D6.DATETIME_ID and  D1.DATETIME_ID = @time)A
